owunowunta udaw kirima manushyayata aawenika wu wasanawantha lakshanayak ,me wasanawantha gunaya peradari karagena minisunta sewaya karanna idiripath wana ayata swechcha katayuthu pilibada jathika lekam karyalaya upakara wanu athi.mema awasthawata eksath jathinge newasika sambandhikaraka ha eksath jathinge sanwardhana wadapiliwelehi shri lanka niyojitha subineyi nandi,samaja sewa amathi upadeshaka karbi da lanarol ,kolambaa wishwa widyalaye upa kulapathi aacharya kumara hirimbauregama, eksath jathinge swechcha sewawe widhayaka sambandhikaraka richad diktas, eksath jathinge swechcha sewaka,wyapruthi sambandhikaraka sam sthembu amathyansha lekam emilda sukumar mahathma mahathmihuda mema awasthawe sabhawa amathuha.janadhipathi aarya shiranthi wikramasinha rajapaksha mahathmiyage swechcha sewaya agayamin sihiwatana thilinayak da amathi filiks perera mahatha athin ethumiyata piliganwimada mehidi sidu kerini.
